addPartnerLegalEntityPage.governingLaw: WELSH - What is the governing law?
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.governingLawHint: WELSH - This is the law that the entity operates under. For example, the Companies Act 2006.
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.whichRegister: WELSH - Which register is it entered in?
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.whichRegisterHint: WELSH - For example, the Companies House public register.
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.countryRegistered: WELSH - Which country is it registered in?
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.registrationNumber: WELSH - What is the registration number?
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.registrationNumberHint: WELSH - For example, the company number.
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.legalFormStatement: WELSH - I confirm the entity has legal personality.
addPartnerLegalEntityPage.publicRegisterLine1: WELSH - We'll show all of this information on the public register.

generalPartner.title: WELSH - Add a general partner (person)

previousName.title: WELSH - Does the general partner have a previous name?
previousName.hint: WELSH - For example, if they've changed their name as a result of marriage or divorce.
previousName.yesHintTitle: WELSH - What is the general partner's previous name?
previousName.yesHint: WELSH - If the partner has more than one previous name, separate each name with a comma.

generalPartner.disqualificationStatement: WELSH - I confirm the general partner is not disqualified under the directors disqualification legislation.
generalPartner.disqualificationStatementLegend: WELSH - General partner - person - disqualification statement

previousName.hint: WELSH - For example, if they've changed their name as a result of marriage or divorce.

previousName.yesHint: WELSH - If the partner has more than one previous name, separate each name with a comma.

addPartnerPersonPage.secondNationality: WELSH - What is their second nationality (if relevant)?
addPartnerPersonPage.secondNationalityHint: WELSH - Dual citizenship (also known as dual nationality) is allowed in some countries. This means you can be a citizen of your own country and another country.
addPartnerPersonPage.publicRegisterLine1: WELSH - We'll only show the month and year of their birth date.
addPartnerPersonPage.publicRegisterLine2: WELSH - We'll show all the other information you provide on this screen on the public register.

errorMessages.firstNameLength: WELSH - First name must be 50 characters or less

errorMessages.previousNameLength: WELSH - Previous name must be 160 characters or less

registeredOfficeAddress.title: WELSH - What is the registered office address of the partnership?
registeredOfficeAddress.titleHint1: WELSH - We'll use this address to send official communications.
registeredOfficeAddress.titleHint2: WELSH - It must be a physical address in the jurisdiction where the partnership was formed. You cannot use a PO Box address.
registeredOfficeAddress.titleHint3: WELSH - You'll need to provide the principal place of business next.
registeredOfficeAddress.publicInformationLine1: WELSH - We'll show the registered office address on the public register.

principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.title: WELSH - What is the principal place of business?
principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.titleHint1: WELSH - This is the address where the day to day running of the business takes place. It could be the same as the registered office address, or a different address.
principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.titleHint2: WELSH - It must be in the jurisdiction where the partnership was formed. It can be changed to an address outside of the jurisdiction after you've registered the partnership.
principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.publicInformationLine1: WELSH - We'll show the principal place of business on the public register.

usualResidentialAddress.title: WELSH - What is the general partner's usual residential address?
usualResidentialAddress.publicInformationLine1: WELSH - We will not show the general partner's usual residential address.

correspondenceAddress.title: WELSH - What is the general partner's correspondence address?
correspondenceAddress.titleHint1: WELSH - This is also known as the service address.
correspondenceAddress.publicInformationLine1: WELSH - We'll show the general partner's correspondence address on the public register.

principalOfficeAddress.title: WELSH - What is the general partner's principal office address?
principalOfficeAddress.publicInformationLine1: WELSH - We'll show the general partner's principal office address on the public register.

usualResidentialAddress.title: WELSH - What is the limited partner's usual residential address?
usualResidentialAddress.publicInformationLine1: WELSH - We will not show the limited partner's usual residential address on the public register.

principalOfficeAddress.title: WELSH - What is the limited partner's principal office address?
principalOfficeAddress.titleHint1: WELSH - This is the address for the entity's main office.
principalOfficeAddress.publicInformationLine1: WELSH - We'll show the limited partner's principal office address on the public register.

capitalContribution.title: WELSH - What is their total capital contribution?
capitalContribution.hint: WELSH - Enter the total value of all monetary and non-monetary contributions
capitalContribution.compositionTitle: WELSH - What is this total value made up of?

checkYourAnswersPage.title: WELSH - Check your answers before sending your application
checkYourAnswersPage.futureLawful: WELSH - I confirm that the intended future activities of the limited partnership are lawful.

types.LP: WELSH - Limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland

emailPage.whatIsEmail: WELSH - What is the registered email address for the partnership?
emailPage.emailHint: WELSH - Partners must be able to access emails that are sent to this address.

emailUsedFor.title: WELSH - What is the registered email address used for?
emailUsedFor.sendInformation: WELSH - In future we'll use this to send important information that relates to the limited partnership. For example, new legislative requirements or warnings about missed deadlines.
emailUsedFor.publicRegister: WELSH - It will not be shown on the public register.

errorPage.title: WELSH - Service unavailable
errorPage.sorryMessage: WELSH - Sorry, the service is unavailable
errorPage.tryLater: WELSH - You will be able to use the service at a later date.
errorPage.moreInfo: WELSH - Email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk, if you need more information.

generalPartnerChoicePage.title: WELSH - Is the general partner a person or a legal entity?
generalPartnerChoicePage.hint: WELSH - You can add more later.

generalPartnersPage.title: WELSH - You now need to tell us about the general partners
generalPartnersPage.pageInformation: WELSH - If the partnership has more than one general partner, you'll add them one at a time.

limitedPartnerChoicePage.isPersonOrLegalEntity: WELSH - Is the limited partner a person or a legal entity?
limitedPartnerChoicePage.isPersonOrLegalEntityHint: WELSH - You can add more later.

limitedPartnersPage.title: WELSH - You now need to tell us about the limited partners
limitedPartnersPage.pageInformation: WELSH - If the partnership has more than one limited partner, you'll add them one at a time.

namePage.title: WELSH - Limited partnership name
namePage.whatIsName: WELSH - What is the limited partnership name?
namePage.whatIsNameHint: WELSH - Do not enter a name ending like Limited Partnership or LP. We will add this for you.

existingPartnershipHint.start: WELSH - You must check the name is not the same as an existing partnership or company on the
existingPartnershipHint.urlName: WELSH - Companies House register (opens in a new tab)
existingPartnershipHint.end: WELSH - If it is, we'll reject your application.

sensitiveWordHint.urlName: WELSH - sensitive words or expressions that require approval (opens in a new tab)
sensitiveWordHint.end: WELSH - you must get permission before you register.

existingTrademarkHint.start: WELSH - You should also use the
existingTrademarkHint.urlName: WELSH - trade mark search (opens in a new tab)
existingTrademarkHint.end: WELSH - to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.

namePage.nameEnding: WELSH - Which limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?
namePage.nameEndingHint: WELSH - There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P. except how they look.
namePage.nameEndingWelshHint: WELSH - There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P. except how they look. Partneriaeth Cyfyngedig, PC, and P.C. can only be used if the partnership's principal place of business is in Wales.

privateFund.title: WELSH - Private fund limited partnership name
privateFund.whatIsName: WELSH - What's the name of the private fund limited partnership?
privateFund.nameEnding: WELSH - Which private fund limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?

scottish.nameEnding: WELSH - Which name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?

pageNotFound.title: WELSH - Page Not Found
pageNotFound.spelling: WELSH - If you typed the web address, check it is spelled correctly.
pageNotFound.copiedAddress: WELSH - If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pageNotFound.movedPage: WELSH - If the web address is correct or you selected a link, the page may have moved.
pageNotFound.goToStartPage: WELSH - To register a limited partnership, go to the Register a limited partnership start page.

publicRegisterInformation.title: WELSH - What information we'll show on the public register

companyNumber.whatIsPartnershipNumber: WELSH - What is the limited partnership number?
companyNumber.hint: WELSH - This is 2 letters followed by 6 numbers.

confirmLimitedPartnership.title: WELSH - Confirm this is the correct limited partnership
confirmLimitedPartnership.name: WELSH - Company name

removePartnerPage.title: WELSH - Are you sure you want to remove

generalPartnersAdded.title: WELSH - General partners you have added so far:
generalPartnersAdded.emptyList: WELSH - You must add at least one General Partner

addGeneralPartner.title: WELSH - Do you need to add another general partner?

limitedPartnersAdded.title: WELSH - Limited partners you have added so far:
limitedPartnersAdded.emptyList: WELSH - You must add at least one Limited Partner

addLimitedPartner.title: WELSH - Do you need to add another limited partner?

sicCodePage.title: WELSH - What is the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code?
sicCodePage.hint: WELSH - You should use the SIC code that best describes the partnership's nature of business.
sicCodePage.find: WELSH - Find your SIC code using our look up tool (opens in new tab)
sicCodePage.additionalHint: WELSH - Enter up to 3 additional SIC codes (optional):
sicCodePage.publicRegisterLine1: WELSH - We'll show the SIC codes on the public register.

signOutPage.title: WELSH - Are you sure you want to sign out?
signOutPage.hint: WELSH - We will save your application.
signOutPage.saved: WELSH - How do I find my saved applications?
signOutPage.filingsInfo: WELSH - Sign in to your Companies House account and select Your filings to access your saved applications.

termPage.title: WELSH - What is the term of the partnership?
termPage.hint: WELSH - This is the length of time for which the partnership will be entered into.
termPage.byAgreement: WELSH - Such term as decided by the partners within the partnership agreement
termPage.untilDissolution: WELSH - Until the general partner determines the partnership is dissolved
termPage.publicRegisterLine1: WELSH - We'll show the term of partnership on the public register.

whereIsTheJurisdiction.title: WELSH - Where is the jurisdiction?
whereIsTheJurisdiction.hint: WELSH - This is where the partnership was formed. The registered office address and principal place of business will need to be in the same jurisdiction.

scotland.title: WELSH - This partnership will be registered in Scotland
scotland.information: WELSH - This means the partnership's registered office address and principal place of business will need to be in Scotland. Select to continue, if this is correct.
scotland.ifNotScotland: WELSH - If these addresses are in England, Wales or Northern Ireland, you will need to go back to change the type of partnership you are registering.

whichTypePage.title: WELSH - Which type of partnership do you want to register?

options.LP: WELSH - Limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland
options.PFLP: WELSH - Private fund limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland
options.SPFLP: WELSH - Private fund limited partnership in Scotland

applicationSubmittedPage.title: WELSH - Application Submitted
applicationSubmittedPage.recieved: WELSH - We've recieved your application to register. We've sent an email to confirm

informationNext.title: WELSH - What happens next
informationNext.information: WELSH - We'll process the application as soon as possible. We'll email to let you know if your application has been accepted or rejected.
informationNext.howLong: WELSH - This will usually take no more than 3 to 5 working days.

applicationSubmittedPage.survey: WELSH - What did you think of this service?
